about_the_game:
In a world filled with Zombies, the last survivor of a Spec Ops squad tries to survive,
and make his way through Hordes of Zombies to reach his final destination.

OVERVIEW


Typing Hero is a Typing Zombie Survival Zombie Experience game.
Play in Handcrafted game levels utilizing stylized graphics.
Type as fast as you can and try to keep yourself alive for as much as possible.
Be fast and accurate with your typing to keep your combos high and increase the points that you earn.
Use the points that you earned to buy upgrades to die less and unlock new weapons.

CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION


Choose between 52 different heads and 30 different skins to customize your character.

UPGRADES


Upgrade your character by purchasing upgrades with the points that you earned during playing. Purchase Body armor to die harder and different weapons with unique upgrades of their own.

FEATURES


  • 5 different difficulty levels to play with, a harder difficulty level awards more points.
  • A lot of Different Zombies to keep the game interesting.
  • 10 Unique hand-crafted maps to play with utilizing stylized graphics.
  • Unique Bosses to make your life harder.
  • Statistics and Typing Statistics (Kills, Waves Survived, Combos, Time Survived, Wpm (Words Per Minute), Words Typed, Letters Typed, Total Errors, and more..)
  • Multiple Language Support for the UI (English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Greek)
  • Steam integrated - Keep your Score and Stats safe with your Steam profile.
  • Steam Achievements
  • Custom Dictionary
  • Color Blindness support
  • Hand Placement guide.

highlighted.name: Home is, where the heart is

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, General Mature Content

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 7100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12 or Later
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Typing Hero

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $9.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $1.99 USD.
subs.option_text: $9.99 USD for a month, then $1.99 USD / month

package_groups.title: Buy Typing Hero Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 7100 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GT 1030 2GB / RX 560 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In a world filled with Zombies, the last survivor of a Spec Ops squad tries to survive, and make his way through Hordes of Zombies to reach his final destination.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Greek
*languages with full audio support
